title: The coolest new piece of tech! Glowforge Aura Craft Laser!

transcript: Hey, it's Justine and welcome to my craft room. I know, I know. I just got a Glowforge Aura and this has pretty much changed my entire life. I have been having so much fun for the past couple of days testing this out, really learning how this all works. Now, most people are familiar with 3D printing. Well, this is a little bit different. This is like 3D extraction. This has a laser that you put in different materials and you can actually cut, etch, you can engrave, you can do all sorts of things. And what's so amazing is they have these materials that are already proof grade. They come from Glowforge and they've got this QR code.
